Super fun, good food and extremely cheap.  After a full day at the Miro museum (just up the hill) we walked down to this gem.  Half of our group stood at the bar but that was fine - suited the relaxed atmosphere.  Everything was one Euro even the beer - you walk around with your plate and pick what you like.  These were all pintxos (except for the postre) very tasty and because of the turnover very fresh.  Try the tortilla and the crema catalana.  Very friendly busy waitstaff behind the counter.
